amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to eliminate funding to the U.S. Agency for International Development, Funds Appropriated to the President Capital Investment Fund.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the U.S. Agency for International Development, Funds Appropriated to the President, Capital Investment Fund by $230,599,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 315 (Roll no. 465).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 315 (Roll no. 465).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
